# The `ExitCodes.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file contains definitions of exit codes for exit() function. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Included Headers

<IncludesList>
<IncludesListItem
  filePath="llvm/Config/llvm-config.h"
  permalink=""
  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This file contains definitions of exit codes for exit() function.

They are either defined by sysexits.h if it is supported, or defined here if sysexits.h is not supported.

The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &lt;sysexits.h&gt; does not exist on z/OS and Windows. The only value used in LLVM</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is EX&#95;IOERR, which is used to signal a special error condition (broken pipe).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Define the macro with its usual value from BSD systems, which is chosen to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not clash with more standard exit codes like 1</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define EX&#95;IOERR 74</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#elif LLVM&#95;ON&#95;UNIX</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#error Exit code EX&#95;IOERR not available</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
